item.title: index
item.description: Information about the structure of fey society. This is primarily based in the Feywild, but some of it has spilled into the Material Plane.

item.title: Geography
item.description: Real World 1848 is the year by which the current continental US’s borders were established.

item.title: Elemental Planes
item.description: The elemental planes of Air, Earth, Fire, and Water are the source of substance and raw magic.

item.title: Ethereal
item.description: As per 5e’s Border Ethereal, this coterminous plane is just slightly out of phase with the Material Plane.

item.title: Feywild
item.description: The Feywild (also called Faerie) is a vibrant verdant plane with vaguely positive-energy alignment.

item.title: Gloaming
item.description: The Gloaming is formed where the Feywild and Shadowfell meet, similar to a para-elemental plane.

item.title: Material Plane
item.description: The plane that contains Columbia and human affairs. Also called the Mortal Realm, especially by the fey.

item.title: Shadowfell
item.description: The Shadowfell is a cold dark plane with a vaguely negative-energy alignment. The Shadowfell is a dark reflection of the Material Plane.

item.title: Spirit Realm
item.description: The Spirit Realm goes by many names: The Dreaming, the Astral, the Deep Ethereal.

item.title: index
item.description: The planes of existence that exist in the World Anew setting.
